description:
(i) The Licence Holder shall monitor and maintain the << weir/v-notch(state size)/gaugeboard>>, and if necessary replace it, so that at all times it measures the <<compensation flow/water level>> <<referenced to a datum approved by the Agency in writing>>, accurately and promptly replace it if it ceases to be fit for purpose.

(ii) The Licence Holder shall ensure that any major repair work, alterations or replacement of the <<compensation water flow measurement devices or recording equipment>> are approved in writing by the Agency prior to the commencement of any such work.
